name: Flight Emissions Calculator
description: Calculate the carbon emissions generated from flights. This calculator estimates emissions based on flight distance, duration, and aircraft type.

name: Server Carbon Footprint Estimator
description: Estimate the carbon footprint of server usage. This tool calculates emissions based on server type, utilization, and energy efficiency.

name: Hotel Carbon Impact Calculator
description: Assess the carbon impact of hotel stays. This calculator estimates emissions based on factors like energy consumption, water usage, and waste generation.

name: eCommerce Shipment Emissions Estimator
description: Estimate carbon emissions associated with eCommerce shipments. This tool calculates emissions based on shipping distance, transportation mode, and package size.

name: Electricity Carbon Usage Estimator
description: Estimate carbon emissions from electricity usage. This tool helps calculate emissions based on energy source, consumption patterns, and efficiency measures.

name: Fuel Consumption Carbon Tracker
description: Track carbon emissions from fuel consumption. This tool allows monitoring and analyzing fuel usage and associated emissions.

name: Vehicle Emissions by Model
description: Analyze vehicle emissions by model. This tool provides insights into carbon emissions of different vehicle models based on factors like fuel efficiency and engine type.
